quote: We were made for God. Only by being in some respect like Him, only by being a manifestation of His beauty, lovingkindness, wisdom or goodness, has any earthly Beloved excited our love.
quote_letters: WE WERE MADE FOR GOD ONLY BY BEING IN SOME RESPECT LIKE HIM ONLY BY BEING A MANIFESTATION OF HIS BEAUTY LOVINGKINDNESS WISDOM OR GOODNESS HAS ANY EARTHLY BELOVED EXCITED OUR LOVE
